title: Burning Man’s Charitable Donations for 2011
author: Burning Man Project
content:
Every year since 2003, Burning Man has used proceeds from ice sales at the event to make year-end donations to various charitable, art and service organizations in Northern Nevada and the San Francisco Bay Area. For 2011, our donations totaled $216,750. Below is a list of charitable donation recipients for 2011:
